# dateStatusModified

**Instance Property**

The date on which the status of the reservation changed.

## Declaration

```swift
var dateStatusModified: Date { get set }
```

## Discussion

When you change the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRestaurantReservationUserBooking/status] property of the reservation, update this property with the date on which the status changed.

## Accessing the Reservation Information

- **guest**: The guest associated with the reservation.
- **status**: The current status of the reservation.
- **guestProvidedSpecialRequestText**: Any special requests made by the user with the reservation.
